crew.name: Hired Help
crew.ability: Before you perform a skill test, you may gain a skill of your choice for that test. If you pass the test, discard this crew.

job.name: Hijacking a Freighter
job.description: The Hutt grumbles at you, and his protocol droid translates. "My master is looking for a team to hijack a freighter."
job.notes: Cannot buy on the Ring of Kafrene.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]5,000, 2 fame, and 1 Hutt reputation. Then remove this card from the game.

job.name: Hutt Favor
job.description: An influential Hutt is angry that someone is encroaching on her territory and wants you to find out what is responsible.
job.encounter: Test Influence. If you pass, complete this job. If you fail, resolve card #41.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]5,000 and 1 Hutt reputation, you also lose 1 Syndicate reputation and gain 1 fame. Then discard this card.

job.name: Imperial Favor
job.description: The Empire wants you to prevent an arms dealer from meeting Rebel operatives on Ryloth.
job.encounter: Test Tactics. If you pass, complete this job. If you fail, resolve card #41.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]5,000 and 1 Imperial reputation. If you alrady had [Positive] Imperial reputation, you also lose 1 Rebel reputation and gain 1 fame. Then discard this card.

job.name: Jabba's Hidden Stash
job.description: "Jabba's got so many credits, he won't even notice a few missing," the Twi'lek says. "The plan's foolproof. You in?"
job.reward: Lose 1 Hutt reputation and gain [Credits]10,000 and 1 fame. Then remove this card fro the game.

job.name: Rebel Favor
job.description: The Rebel alliance is looking for someone who knows their way around Imperial installations.
job.encounter: Test Knowledge. If you pass, complete this job. If you fail, resolve card #41.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]5,000 and 1 Rebel reputation. If you already had [Positive] Rebel reputation, you also lose 1 Imperial reputation and gain 1 fame. Then discard this card.

job.name: Relic of the Past
job.description: You have uncovered information about an underwater temple on Mon Calamari. Surely there is something of worth there.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]5,000 and 1 fame. Then remove this card from the game.

job.name: Rescue from the Mines
job.description: A local governor's son fell in with an unsavory crowd and landed himself in the spice mines of Kessel. His mother will pay a generous fee to anyone gutsy enough to break him out.
job.reward: Lost 1 Syndicate reputation and gain [Credits]8,000 and 1 fame. Then remove this card from the game.

job.name: Rooting Out Spies
job.description: Maz senses that there are Imperial agents in her midst, and she has asked for help rooting out the spies.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]5,000 and 1 fame. Then remove this card from the game.

job.name: Syndicate Favor
job.description: A crime syndicate is looking for someone who understands many languages to inherit the Hutt Grand Council.
job.encounter: Test Knowledge. If you pass, complete this job. If you fail, resolve card #41.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]5,000 and 1 Syndicate reputation. If you already had [Positive] Syndicate reputation, you also lose 1 Hutt reputation and gain 1 fame. Then discard this card.

job.name: The Casino Heist
job.description: The casino has more credits than they know what to do with. No one will notice if you skim a little off the top, right?
job.reward: Gain [Credits]15,000. Then remove this card from the game.

job.name: The Jewel of Yavin
job.description: The galaxy's elite gather at Naboo to bid on the dazzling corusca gem, the Jewel of Yavin. It has already been stolen once, so you expect security to be tight.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]15,000 and 1 fame. Then remove this card from the game.

job.name: The Kessel Run
job.description: Deep under the surface of Kessel is a rich vein of coaxium ore. You've been hired to steal some.
job.reward: Gain [Credits]10,000 and 2 fame. Then remove this card from the game.
